examples: The book describes her life from cradle to grave.
But the lawyers also described internal politics that at times slowed down the department's work or drove a wedge among members of the team.
And after the match, the Carlisle boss wasn't pulling his punches when describing his players' performance.
BBC is falling over backwards to be impartial by describing this as a crowd!
It was described as a large, luxury mobile home, but there was barely room to swing a cat.
words.defineEn: to give details about someone or something to say what they are like
words.defineVi: để cung cấp thông tin chi tiết về một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó để nói họ như thế nào

examples: She spends her free time gardening as a hobby.
My wife enjoys reading books in her free time during the week.
I had some free time in class, so I made hay while the sun shone and did the extra assignment.
I always try to fill my free time with meaningful pursuits instead of wasting hours in front of mindless entertainment, remembering the wise words that idle hands are the devil's playthings.
The procrastinator complained about not having enough time to pursue their hobbies, but idle folk have the least leisure, and their lack of productivity left them with little free time.
words.defineEn: a time when we do not have to work or do any important things, and we can choose what we want to do with that time
words.defineVi: khoảng thời gian mà chúng ta không phải làm việc hoặc làm bất kỳ việc quan trọng nào, và chúng ta có thể chọn những gì chúng ta muốn làm với thời gian đó

examples: In his leisure time he follows West Ham United.
It's true what they say, the busiest men have the most leisure.
She had a job which never got in the way of her leisure interests.
The procrastinator complained about not having enough time to pursue their hobbies, but idle folk have the least leisure, and their lack of productivity left them with little free time.
Mary spent her days in pointless leisure while her potential wasted away, proving that as good be an addled egg as an idle bird.
words.defineEn: a time for relaxing when one is free from duties and can spend one's time doing fun activities
words.defineVi: thời gian để thư giãn khi một người rảnh rỗi và có thể dành thời gian cho các hoạt động vui chơi

examples: Activities range from trapeze and freefall to archery and motorsports.
What's your favorite evening activity?
The whole house was a hive of activity on the day before the wedding.
There's a lot of police activity around here lately.
Italy's Mediterranean climate and diverse geography offer a wide range of outdoor activities
words.defineEn: something that a person spends time doing, particularly to accomplish a certain purpose
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó mà một người dành thời gian làm, đặc biệt là để hoàn thành một mục đích nhất định

examples: Exercise can make a big difference to your state of health.
Regular exercise is essential for the healthfulness of your body and mind.
It is no longer exercising power through velvet gloves.
She did exercises to strengthen her back muscles.
He performed knee exercises to strengthen the muscles around the joint.
words.defineEn: a mental or physical activity that helps keep our mind and body healthy
words.defineVi: một hoạt động tinh thần hoặc thể chất giúp giữ cho tâm trí và cơ thể của chúng tôi khỏe mạnh

words.defineEn: to rest or sleep for a short period of time during the day
words.defineVi: để nghỉ ngơi hoặc ngủ trong một khoảng thời gian ngắn trong ngày

examples: listen to our problems.
Listen Jane.
I listened carefully to her story.
Don’t listen to Jerry.
Don't listen to him.
words.defineEn: to give our attention to the sound a person or thing is making
words.defineVi: để cung cấp cho sự chú ý của chúng tôi đến âm thanh một người hoặc điều đang làm

examples: Can you read music?
The music was far too loud for my liking.
Her words were music to my ears.
Set this poem to music.
That music really gets me.
words.defineEn: a series of sounds made by instruments or voices, arranged in a way that is pleasant or exciting to listen to
words.defineVi: một loạt âm thanh được tạo ra bởi các nhạc cụ hoặc giọng nói, được sắp xếp theo cách dễ chịu hoặc thú vị để nghe

examples: Generally, the article reads very well.
My son reads twelve pages of his book every day.
Read my lips.
Read my lips.
Teachers should read more poetry to children.
words.defineEn: to look at written or printed words and understand their meaning
words.defineVi: nhìn vào các từ được viết hoặc in và hiểu ý nghĩa của chúng

examples: The manager played his strongest side of the season.
The bedside radio played softly.
The media, as always, played an important part in the election campaign.
Fathers play a crucial role in their children's upbringing and development.
His dedication and hard work played a big part in the company's success.
words.defineEn: to enjoy yourself and do things for fun, like children
words.defineVi: để tận hưởng bản thân và làm những điều cho vui, giống như trẻ em

examples: The soccer team has ten players on the field at a time.
They practice their soccer skills every day after school.
She kicked the soccer ball with her foot.
They had a friendly soccer match with their friends in the park.
She joined a soccer league to compete against other teams.
words.defineEn: a type of sport where two teams, with eleven players each, try to kick a ball into a specific area to win points
words.defineVi: một loại hình thể thao trong đó hai đội, mỗi đội có mười một người chơi, cố gắng đá một quả bóng vào một khu vực cụ thể để giành điểm

examples: Check the remix.
The active ingredient checks the growth of bacteria.
Check the box next to the right answer.
I’ll check the dates.
Any baggage over five kilos must be checked.
words.defineEn: to make sure that a thing is true, correct, present, or in a good condition by examining something
words.defineVi: để đảm bảo rằng một điều là đúng, chính xác, hiện tại hoặc trong tình trạng tốt bằng cách kiểm tra một cái gì đó

examples: The email went to everyone in the company.
I don't send emails blowing smoke up their asses.
I received an automated email from the accountant saying that she was out to lunch.
My coworker put her foot in it when she accidentally sent an email to the wrong person.
In the past, it was common to send handwritten letters but nowadays email is the preferred method of communication, other times, other manners.
words.defineEn: a digital message that is sent from one person to another person or group of people using a system called email
words.defineVi: một tin nhắn kỹ thuật số được gửi từ một người đến một người khác hoặc một nhóm người sử dụng một hệ thống gọi là email

words.defineEn: to leave the house to go somewhere, usually to do something enjoyable
words.defineVi: rời khỏi nhà để đi đâu đó, thường là để làm điều gì đó thú vị

examples: The price includes dinner, bed, and breakfast.
After dinner comes the reckoning.
The bell sounded for dinner.
The government's latest proposals are a dog's dinner.
Dinner is served between 7 and 10 p.m.
words.defineEn: the main meal of the day, eaten either in the middle of the day or in the evening
words.defineVi: bữa ăn chính trong ngày, ăn vào giữa ngày hoặc vào buổi tối

examples: The Siemens display goes the whole hog.
The cruise went very quickly.
My laptop went haywire
To go swimming/fishing/jogging.
The email went to everyone in the company.
words.defineEn: to travel or move from one location to another location
words.defineVi: để đi du lịch hoặc di chuyển từ một địa điểm đến một địa điểm khác

examples: Movies and TV shows are full of instant science.
We are at the Movies for Grownups Awards.
[Martin Short Host] Welcome to AARP's Movies For Grownups Awards or as I call them, The Olden Globes.
But you can play catch-up thanks to my list of the Top 10 Most Underrated Movies of 2014 on this week's episode of Angry Nerd!
- I'm gonna need a raise, I just told him I need Hello and welcome to Not At The Movies.
words.defineEn: a place that shows movies
words.defineVi: nơi chiếu phim

examples: Dancing seemed to come naturally to her.
She only wanted him to go on dancing till he dropped.
-I always loved dancing.
He doesn't like dancing.
What's good dancing music, for dancing?
words.defineEn: ‌the act of moving our body to music; a set of movements performed to music
words.defineVi: ‌hành động di chuyển cơ thể của chúng ta theo âm nhạc; một tập hợp các phong trào thực hiện âm nhạc

examples: They visit their grandmother every weekend.
We sometimes visit our relatives during the holidays.
They often visit their grandparents on weekends.
We usually visit our grandparents during the holidays.
We visited a local smokehouse renowned for its mouthwatering brisket.
words.defineEn: to go somewhere because we want to spend time with someone
words.defineVi: đi đâu đó vì chúng ta muốn dành thời gian với ai đó

examples: Friends shared a platter of crispy chicken wings with tangy dipping sauces at the sports bar.
The new student quickly made friends with the other musicians, because birds of a feather flock together.
My friends enjoyed tangy barbecue gammon skewers at the summer barbecue.
My friend prefers a vegetarian sandwich with avocado and sprouts.
My friends enjoyed smoky beef rib chops at the countryside barbecue.
words.defineEn: someone we know well, like a lot, and trust, but normally they are not part of our family
words.defineVi: một người mà chúng ta biết rõ, rất thích và tin tưởng, nhưng thông thường họ không phải là một phần của gia đình chúng ta
